titleStmt.title: An historical discourse, briefly setting forth the nature of procurations, and how they were anciently paid, with the reason of their payment; and somewhat also of synodals and pentecostals: with an appendix in answer to an opposer. By J.S.
titleStmt.author: J. S. John Stephens.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by R. Hodgkinson, and are to be sold at the Rose and Crown in St. Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "tevens" has been added after the "S" on the title page; "Feb: 1st 1660"; the second 1 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproductions of the originals in the Union Theological Seminary, New York (Early English Books), and the British Library (Thomason Tracts).
